entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Manicouagan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:45 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -33.6°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature steady near minus 32.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Local blowing snow. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near minus 32. Wind chill minus 53 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 33.

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 23.
